incline.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if a situation, fact etc inclines you to do or think something, it influences you towards a particular action or opinion
incline.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The accident inclined him to reconsider his career.
incline.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to think that a particular belief or opinion is most likely to be correct
incline.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: I incline to accept the official version of events.
I incline to the opinion that this principle extends to cases of religious discrimination.
incline.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to slope at a particular angle, or to make something do this
incline.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: The telescope is inclined at an angle of 43 degrees.
